title: AD growing faster than LRAS, Fed action

content.question: If aggregate demand is growing faster than long-run aggregate supply, the Federal Reserve is most likely to

choices.label: increase the interest rate on reserve balances

content.answer: increase the interest rate on reserve balances

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
